original_text: Then the Lord said, “Put your hand inside your cloak.” So Moses put his hand into his cloak, and when he took it out, the skin was leprous—it had become as white as snow.
korean_text: 여호와께서 또 그에게 이르시되 네 손을 품에 넣으라 하시매 그가 손을 품에 넣었다가 내어보니 그의 손에 나병이 생겨 눈 같이 된지라

sentences.original_text: Put your hand inside your cloak
sentences.korean_translation: 네 손을 네 겉옷 안에 넣으라

sentences.original_text: So Moses put his hand into his cloak
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 모세가 그의 손을 그의 겉옷 안에 넣으니

sentences.original_text: and when he took it out
it had become as white as snow
